changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_TIMESERIES_ID DEFAULT NEWID(), FEWS_DATA VARBINARY(MAX) NOT NULL, FEWS_PARAMETERS NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL, TIMESERIES_HEADER_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL INDEX IX_TIMESERIES_TIMESERIES_HEADER_ID, CONSTRAINT PK_TIMESERIES PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (ID), CONSTRAINT FK_TIMESERIES_TIMESERIES_HEADER FOREIGN KEY (TIMESERIES_HEADER_ID) REFERENCES ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER (ID) )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES
